product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: My husband is on his feet for a lot of the day and really appreciates having a good pair of socks to wear. These cotton socks from Stanzino were a great choice to keep his toes happy!When we buy my husband shoes, we tend to purchase between size 11-13 in men's depending on the manufacturer. These socks were a tiny bit small on him and the heel seam didn't come high enough to rest exactly on his heel, but it wasn't bad enough where he couldn't wear them and he even reported that they were more comfortable by the end of the day. The tops cover his ankles without going too high. The cotton material is soft and really helps to keep his feet comfortable whether he's in boots or low-tops!We're so glad to be able to add twelve pairs of these to his wardrobe! It's nice to have a large quantity of good, black cotton socks! We did receive this product at a discount but price doesn't change how comfortable they are, nor does it effect my review!

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: This is a great 12 pack of cotton socks. They are high quality and just the right thickness. I bought these for my husband and we did find they are a little big but not to bad that he can't use them. The cotton is breathable so his feet aren't sweating which is a huge plus living in Florida. My husband is on his feet constantly and he is always wearing out socks fast but I am not seeing any wear and tear in these socks and he has been using them since we got them. I have washed them multiple times and we had no shrinking and no color loss they are still just as black as the first day we got them. I would definitely recommend this brand of socks. We are both impressed. I purchased this at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. I was not paid or sponsored for my opinions all thoughts reflected in this review are my own.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: My husband goes threw socks more than any man I know! He is either loosing them, or wear them to the point he has holes. So far these socks have held up longer than any other brand of socks we have bought him. The pack comes with 12 pair vs 6 pairs like the store brands. This means less wearing over and over so the socks don't wear out. The less wash and wear the longer the life span. The socks fit my husband who has really large feet. We usually have to buy multiple different kinds just to get pairs that mostly fit. I received this product in exchange for my unbiased review.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.I got these socks for my father who somehow always manages to run out of clean socks, I really do not know how he goes through so many pairs but anyways, he is super picky about everything so I was nervous about how he was going to like these socks.When I gave them to him he loved them! It said they were the perfect length for him (he hates ankle socks), and they were the perfect material and thickness, one thing he can;t stand is thick bulky socks that make your feet sweat. Not only are these socks soft, comfortable and light but you can't beat the price, honestly for the quality of these socks it is a steal and I am planning on buying his socks from here continuously.PROS:- Soft material- light and breathable- perfect length above the ankle- comfortable to wear- do not fade in color or threading after washing- UNBEATABLE PRICEcons:nothing at allThese socks are the real deal, if my picky dad loves them so would you! They are light, breathable, soft comfortable and high quality!

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: The socks are small and fit tightly  around the top .

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: A little narrow for my taste. I ordered the 10 - 13 size socks and the length is OK. However, there is no choice for width and a EXXX would have be much more comfortable. Otherwise, a great sock. Like wearing a sock within a sock and they pull the moisture away from the feet.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: These socks fit extremely tight and seem to be a little short compared to normal work socks. They are comfortable though and wick moisture away from your feet very well. I originally gave these a one-star rating due to the fit, but after wearing them for a couple of weeks I've change my mind. My advice would be to order a one size larger than normal.

product_title: Calvin Klein Men's 3 Pack Cotton Rich Casual Rib Sock
review_body: Calvin Klein products for me are great. They fit and look great.

product_title: Calvin Klein Men's 3 Pack Cotton Rich Casual Rib Sock
review_body: I've been looking for two years for medium weight black cotton crew socks, ever since Lands End cheaped out on their men's crew socks. These are the best I've found so far. They're not padded, but they are substantial and definitely thicker than dress socks. They're very soft, stay up well, and wash well in cold water. I'm a woman's size 8.5 shoe, and the men's 7-12 are a little bit big, but they work. I'm 5'6", and these are almost long enough to be knee socks on me. My only complaint is that the tops are tight in the ankles and calves, and I have very skinny calves, as in, most boots are too big around the calves on me.

product_title: Calvin Klein Men's 3 Pack Cotton Rich Casual Rib Sock
review_body: I've been looking for simple cotton, crew socks that are not too thick or cushioned, and don't fall down constantly. These seem to fit the bill. They are shedding a lot of lint on my feet in the initial wearings, but hopeful this will stop after I have washed them a few times. I cannot yet say how durable they will be, but they seem well made. So far I am happy with them. The sort of old-school cotton crew socks that used to be very easy to find but are now rather rare.

product_title: Fine Fit Men's Stripe Colorful Cotton Socks (2 Pair)
review_body: I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my husband. He LOVES them. Such a fun change from the typical black dress sock. These socks came in a great variety of colors and styles and are good quality.

product_title: Fine Fit Men's Stripe Colorful Cotton Socks (2 Pair)
review_body: Not the most expensive fabric but they do look really nice.

product_title: Fine Fit Men's Stripe Colorful Cotton Socks (2 Pair)
review_body: These socks are comfortable and a lot of fun. You're never too old to have fun with style!

product_title: Fine Fit Men's Stripe Colorful Cotton Socks (2 Pair)
review_body: These are beautiful and excellent quality socks. We love them. They are not overly thick, but a nice weight.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: These are decent athletic socks.  They have a high cotton content, so they breath.  I thought they felt a little rough on the first wearing, but softened after washing with no noticeable shrinkage.  They stayed in place while exercising and didn't slide down.  I can't say that I got any special support, fashion points, or shock absorbing benefits from them, like it says in the description.  Discounted sample provided for review.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: I wish that these socks were just a little larger as I am concerned that over time, and especially once washed....which has not happened yet, they will be a struggle for comfort. And, if I need to pull them a little harder, they won't last long.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: These men's cotton active socks are great for walking or running.  They fit comfortably and are just the right thickness.  They absorb moisture so your feet stay drier.  They are also breathable so they don't make you too hot.  They have spandex in them so they stay up but aren't too tight.  My son loves how they fit.  For the price for 12 of them you can't beat that!!  They are nice socks!! I received this product complementary exchange for my honest opinion and unbiased review. These are just my own opinions and based on my personal experience.

product_title: BambooMN - Men's Rayon from Bamboo Fiber Mid-Calf Socks - Size M/L/XL
review_body: very comfortable and light weight socks , would like to order more, but they seem to be unavailable, at this time. I am not sure how they will wear over time.

product_title: BambooMN - Men's Rayon from Bamboo Fiber Mid-Calf Socks - Size M/L/XL
review_body: These socks will make your feet feel like they are wrapped in a cloud. Nice and breathable, and also have nice elasticity so they won't fall down. They do ride above the calf and can be stretched to the knee, so while they are a bit longer than I expected I still like them. Perfect as a dress sock and fit nice inside dress shoes. I just bought more.

product_title: BambooMN - Men's Rayon from Bamboo Fiber Mid-Calf Socks - Size M/L/XL
review_body: Overall the material feels great but these socks can be really tight around my leg at the top and I have pretty slim legs.  So I imagine it could be quite a squeeze for thicker boned people.

product_title: BambooMN - Men's Rayon from Bamboo Fiber Mid-Calf Socks - Size M/L/XL
review_body: Fits well, looks and feels good. Needed some sock that wouldn't be too hot in summer, nor too cold in winter. These seem to do the trick.

product_title: Mens 100% Cotton Plain Work/Casual Socks (Pack Of 6)
review_body: Good quality for the price. If you need 100% cotton socks, these are good. Delivery comes much faster than indicated.

product_title: Mens 100% Cotton Plain Work/Casual Socks (Pack Of 6)
review_body: These were amazing super absorbent and h eloped cure my brother foot odor

product_title: QUANGANG Men's Summer Comfort Crew Low Cut Ankle Boat Socks 6-Pack
review_body: I bought these for my husband to try instead of the regular business sock. He loves them! Says they feel & fit nicely. Will order again.

product_title: QUANGANG Men's Summer Comfort Crew Low Cut Ankle Boat Socks 6-Pack
review_body: Good socks, I will buy more...  They're kind of thin but I'm finding that I like that...

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: Good socks I like the way they fit. The material looks durable and soft.

product_title: Stanzino® 12 Pair Men's Color Cotton Active Sock - Moisture Wicking for Running
review_body: When it comesto good quality socks for work and play these fit the needs. They are soft and comfy yet made of strong material. They are so comffy that you forget your wearing them and they fit like a glove. I even used these for work and they supprisingly didnt make my feet sweat or create a nasty odor which other socks give. These fold up like other socks and I recommedn these for everyone both ale and female. They are not too thick and not too thin there perfect.

product_title: Mens 100% Cotton Ribbed Classic Socks (Pack Of 6)
review_body: It's difficult to find 100%cotton socks, so this one is very good on this point. But it's a little bit fragile, got holes on it after a week.

product_title: Mens 100% Cotton Ribbed Classic Socks (Pack Of 6)
review_body: I just love these light, non-elastic socks. I will purchase more in the future. The weather is so hot this summer; especially in the South (Georgia, USA) and these socks with sandals are the answer for me.

product_title: Men's Dress Socks Thin Ribbed Texture Black Soft Cotton Blend Size 8-12 (12 Pair)
review_body: Socks are good, but they leave black fuzz. I guess it is good for the money,

product_title: Men's Dress Socks Thin Ribbed Texture Black Soft Cotton Blend Size 8-12 (12 Pair)
review_body: I bought these for my husband, who goes through socks like a hurricane.  He tells me that he likes these socks, especially the fit..  Since he has a wide foot, some socks don't meet his expectations.  But these do fit and are comfortable.  Because these socks were such a great value, I hesitated before buying them.  But,  I am glad I made the purchase.

product_title: Men's Dress Socks Thin Ribbed Texture Black Soft Cotton Blend Size 8-12 (12 Pair)
review_body: Have been wearing these for about two weeks and am happy with them. They are basic black socks, not gray like the photo. They are are a bit snug on the legs, but not tight like support hose. They stay up reasonably well, but do tend to creep down a bit during a long day - not annoying - more or less like other socks that I've had. Like other reviewers, I only keep one type of black socks so I never need to pair or match them up, and these are serving me well.A good deal for the money.

product_title: WrightSock Men's Ultra Thin Crew
review_body: Very comfortable and keep feet cool. A little on the pricey side so we hope they wear well.

product_title: WrightSock Men's Ultra Thin Crew
review_body: I have been looking for thin socks for a long time. I wish it was cheaper so I could buy more.

product_title: WrightSock Men's Ultra Thin Crew
review_body: Very thin sock, yet provides comfort support. Fits perfect and stays up.

product_title: Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: A little pricey, but great for working out and running. Totally worth the money.

product_title: Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: These are great socks I bought for more wife. She exercises more every day without any complains in her feet. I recommend them if you want to increase your level of exercise without compromising your comfortable level.

product_title: K. Bell Socks Women's 6 Pack Fashion No Show Liner Socks
review_body: If you like very thin material, these are perfect. We live in a hot climate and prefer very thin socks. Great deal and great fit!

product_title: K. Bell Socks Women's 6 Pack Fashion No Show Liner Socks
review_body: Just as expected, slightly thin but for the summer that's what I wanted.

product_title: Thorlo Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: these socks are super soft and provide padding in the right places. So far, they're great!

product_title: Thorlo Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: Best running socks. Snug fit, great cushioning, and keep your feet dry. What more could you want?

product_title: Thorlo Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: Good coverage of toe and heel provided proper cushioning, especially in the heell. Very comfortable for walking. CooLMax wicking not as efficient as expected. but still an improvement over plain cotton walking socks.

product_title: James Fiallo Men's 12-Pairs Low Cut Athletic Sport Socks
review_body: Great Socks! Look and fit great, Only negative is they are a bit warm to wear in the summer.

product_title: Wigwam Men's El Pine Sock
review_body: Excellent socks for winter time. Keep you warm without sweating. -- Highly recommend them.

product_title: Utopia Wear Men's Premium Cushion Ankle Socks (12 Pairs)
review_body: Great socks, good quality. Haven't had any problems. Perfect for summer

product_title: Mens Pattern Cotton Blend Argyle Socks (Pack Of 6)
review_body: Good looking sock. Seems like it will last the usual amount of time.

product_title: PEOPLE SOCKS 4pairs 71% Merino Wool Ankle Socks for Men Women Made in USA
review_body: Love these people socks.  Summer or winter that is all I wear now.  The difference between merino wool and cotton is amazing.  I'll never go back to damp, clammy cotton socks again!

product_title: Wrightsock Women's Coolmesh Athletic Socks Three-Pack
review_body: These are the best socks ever, great for walking, nice cushion, and they feel soft on your feet. They also keep your feet feeling dry even after a long hot walk. I only ever wore natural fibre until my first pair of these. As for size, I like socks to fit snug and these are perfect for my size 9 feet.

product_title: Wigwam Men's Cool-Lite Mid Hiker Pro Quarter Length Sock
review_body: Love these socks.  Orignally got them for summer hiking, now I wear them any time 1) socks are needed and 2) business attire is not required.  They lose some of their springiness over months/years, but remain comfortable and serviceable.

product_title: Dockers Men's Big & Tall Cushioned Sport Crew Socks, Pack of Three,
review_body: Great fit and comfort, but cotton is shedding quite a bit after only 3 washes.

product_title: HUE Women's Cotton Body Socks (Pack of 3)
review_body: great socks for the three digits summer days, very comfortable and great price.

product_title: Fine Fit Mens Designer Dress Socks Argyle & Striped Size 10-13 (10 Pairs)
review_body: I've only worn a subset of them so far, but they are of good quality, allow your feet to breathe (high cotton content). Only washed once - came out fine, no running of colors and they didn't break down. Good value.Would buy again.

product_title: Mens 100% Cotton Plain Work/Casual Socks (Pack Of 6)
review_body: We bought these for a family member who has sweaty feet. Cotton socks have helped keep his feet dry. However, being 100% cotton they stretch and loosen after washing and wearing them. They don't fall down or pool at the ankles, but it isn't snug and this can be annoying. You win some with the breathability of the cotton, but lose some because it stretches and doesn't bounce back. We're still in search of the perfect socks.

product_title: Wigwam Men's At Work 3-Pack Crew Socks
review_body: These a good quality and comfortable socks, but I'm still left imagining a dream pair that feel like this yet breathe better.

product_title: Wigwam Men's Merino Wool Comfort Hiker midweight Crew Length Socks
review_body: Best socks I ever wore, keeps my feet cool in the warm weather and warm in the cold. Very comfortable, not scratchy at all. Well worth the extra money.

product_title: Fruit of the Loom Men's Value 10 Pack Low Cut Socks
review_body: Cotton content has been reduced from previous socks.  Polyesters and plastic based fabrics should be minimized.

product_title: Girls Ladies 6 Pairs Summer Thin Ribbed Ankle Casual Socks Solid Plain White
review_body: These socks are so comfortable, no regrets on this purchase,, buying more actually..

product_title: Girls Ladies 6 Pairs Summer Thin Ribbed Ankle Casual Socks Solid Plain White
review_body: Very comfy socks, but thicker than I'd hoped for to cool my feet.  Fit perfectly. My neuropathy burns and I live in a hot climate, so I was hoping they'd be so thin they were transparent, as they appear in the picture, but they're not. Exactly like my Hanes low rise socks. Very good price and quick delivery. I always wish these kinds of things came in navy, but it's always just white, or white and black.

product_title: Gold Toe Women's Cotton Trouser 3 Pack
review_body: These were a little thinner in material than I thought but still a fantastic sock.

product_title: Hanes Women's 6 Pack Comfort Blend Ankle Sock
review_body: Just what I needed for summer and Crocs. Bare feet stick, and toes jam -- but i wanted something cool.

product_title: 12 Pairs Mens 100% Cotton Black Non Elastic Top Socks
review_body: These socks are what I've been looking for- comfy and breathable. Really nice material- my feet totally loves 'em!

product_title: Sierra Socks Health Diabetic Arthritic Cotton Cushioned Sole Women's 3 Pair Pack
review_body: Fit well and are not too heavy. Perfect for summertime when socks needed.

product_title: 36 Pairs (0.49 A PAIR) Cotton Colorful Low Cut Socks (Colors,Styling & Print May Vary)
review_body: sooooo soft and I have narrow 6.5 feet and it fit perfectly. It's light and perfect for the summer.

product_title: Russell Athletic Men's Big & Tall King Sized Cotton Low Cut Socks, 3-Pack
review_body: I like the feel but they seem to run a bit small.

product_title: Classic Men's 3-Pack Soft Ribbed Cotton Crew Dress Socks-White
review_body: Perfect fit, thin enough to fit my slip on shoes just right.

product_title: Men's Pattern, Stripe Dress Socks, 12 Pairs, Size 10-13
review_body: Material is a bit thin, but happy with the socks nonetheless

product_title: Wigwam Men's Cool-Lite Mid Hiker Pro Quarter Length Sock
review_body: Awesome socks for summer in Florida.  Nice padded sole for comfort.  Breathable on top so you don't sweat to death.

product_title: Mamia Women's Ankle Low Cut Blank Plain Socks (12 Pair)
review_body: Nice and thin cotton socks! Great to wear in the summer

product_title: HUE Women's Cotton Liner No-Show Sock 6-Pack
review_body: These fit as expected and are very thin. Great for summer!

product_title: TexereSilk Men's Crew-neck T-Shirt Bamboo Underwear
review_body: The fit was great, long enough and the fabric is so soft.

product_title: 36 Pairs (0.49 A PAIR) Cotton Colorful Low Cut Socks (Colors,Styling & Print May Vary)
review_body: These are great for what I'm looking for- which is a thin/basic sock. They are just the right amount of stretchy and fit perfectly into my workout shoes that I wear to the gym.

product_title: Wolverine Men's Cotton-Blend Cushioned Socks (Pack of Two)
review_body: Great comfortable socks even in hot weather! Thick cushion sole. Very tuff wearing sock. Highest of quality in my opinion.

product_title: Gold Toe Men's Cotton Cushion No Show Socks, 6-Pack
review_body: Comfortable socks, expected them to be thicker, because of the high cotton percentage.

product_title: Ladies 6 Pairs Dark Colors Striped Thin Colorful Crew Trouser Casual Shoe Socks
review_body: Cute everyday socks that add a little fun and pizzaz to boring standard monotone socks.  Fit is not to tight or restricting.  Lightweight for summertime.  Perfect work sock.  Held up for the first few washings.

product_title: Everlast Mens No Show Socks 7 Pair Value Pack Black Sizes 10-13
review_body: These socks are perfect for summer.  Yes, they are thin but keep your feet from perspiring yet give you cool comfort.  I bought a 2nd bundle of them.  Also, they are much thicker than women's socks !!!!!!!!!!!!  Fit my bill and feet perfectly !!!!!

product_title: American Apparel Women Cotton Solid Thigh-High Socks
review_body: These are great for women who want warm feet and gentlemen who like the look of stockings on those ladies.

product_title: Vagden Quick Dry Coolmax Military Combat Boot Liner Socks (6 Pairs)
review_body: These socks are a bit thin, and taller than expected, but fit nicely and have been good boot-socks.

product_title: Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: These are awesome they fit great yet you can hardly tell your wearing a sock.

product_title: Thorlo Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: These socks are very comfortable! I bought a second pair after running a few longer runs in them.

product_title: Fruit of the Loom Men's 7-Pack Black & Grey Boxer Briefs 100% Cotton Underwear, Large
review_body: These were too warm for the summer - should be nice and comfy when the weather is cooler.

product_title: Calvin Klein Men's 3 Pack Non Binding Dress Socks
review_body: These are very thin and might be useful with shoes that are too tight. They tend to collect lint during the wash and dry process.

product_title: Men's Boxer Shorts - Luxury Bamboo Boxer Underwear - Breathable Jersey Boxers
review_body: Comfortable fit and feel. Very soft and cool, sweat wicks away. I'm a customer that will come back for a great product like this.

product_title: Calvin Klein Men's Three-Pack Cotton Classic Woven Boxer
review_body: Soft, comfortable, but way too short and too narrow for my chunky man-thighs.  The short & skinny only need apply.

product_title: Champion Men's Open Bottom Light Weight Jersey pants
review_body: Comfortable and a nice thin cotton.  Perfect for Spring and Fall

product_title: Thorlos Unisex Walking Crew Single Pair
review_body: Nice sock.  Just a little too warm for general every day wear in the summer time.

product_title: Hanes Men's Comfortsoft Cotton Printed Lounge Pants-b
review_body: These are nice, light-weight lounge pants. They fulfill the need for something not too warm for the spring, but still provide coverage and comfort. The material is very thin, not thick flannel. They have a good length and the material is soft and has a bit of stretch.

product_title: Thorlo Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: Fits well, and they last a long time without getting worn out.

product_title: Thorlo Men's - Women's Thin Padded Running Low-Cut Socks
review_body: This sock is a little tight around the ankle and doesn't feel as long as some of there other socks that I own.

product_title: Jockey Men's Underwear Microfiber Performance Boxer Brief - 2 Pack
review_body: A bit too hot for the summer. I had hoped they would breathe better. Otherwise, design is near perfect.

product_title: Intimo Men's Woven Pant
review_body: Good fit, looks great as well! Fabric is a little thin for cold days.

product_title: Dickies Men's 3 Pack Dri-Tech Moisture Control Heather Assortment Crew Socks
review_body: Good quality and just the right texture and thickness for the colder weather.

product_title: Hanes Men's 10 Pack X-Temp No Show Socks, White/Red, 10-13/Shoe Size 6-12
review_body: These are thinner yet still comfortable.  Great for summer and a good price!

product_title: Gold Toe Men's Cotton Quarter 6 Plus 2 Bonus Pack
review_body: Best socks...  Thick and soft without binding or being too hot.

product_title: Champion Men's Tech Performance Boxer Brief
review_body: Quite comfortable in warm weather.  Doesn't get that damp and clingy feeling like traditional cotton underwear.

product_title: Wigwam Men's Merino Wool Comfort Hiker midweight Crew Length Socks
review_body: Very warm, very comfortable. Not so thick that your shoes feel tighter than they should.

product_title: Duofold Men's Mid-Weight Moisture-Wicking Ankle-Length Layering Pant
review_body: Light weight and very comfortableperfect under jeans on a cold day

product_title: Jockey Women's Cotton Long Pant
review_body: Fits great and the fabric is soft and thin. Not good if you want warmth but great for summer time.

product_title: Hanes Men`s Cushion Crew Socks
review_body: Not as thick as I expected, but not bad for summer.

product_title: Champion Men's 3-Pack Smart Temp Boxer Brief
review_body: So soft, breathes very well.  These are by far my favorites to wear for any occasion. They are good for hot days because they are thin, good with sports because they are supportive, and they stay in place.

product_title: Russell Athletic Men's Mesh Short with Pockets
review_body: Material is pretty thin- but feels great on a hot day.
